description: Watchdog who criticized NYPD's handling of officer discipline resigns
extended: The head of an oversight board that investigates allegations of misconduct by New York City police officers has announced her resignation, ending a tenure in which she had publicly criticized the NYPD’s handling of a major disciplinary case

description: From Online Drug Lord to Crypto Entrepreneur, Blake Benthall Is Back in Business - The New York Times
Badllama 3: removing safety finetuning from Llama 3 in minutes
extended: We show that extensive LLM safety fine-tuning is easily subverted when an attacker has access to model weights. We evaluate three state-of-the-art fine-tuning methods-QLoRA, ReFT, and Ortho-and show how algorithmic advances enable constant jailbreaking performance with cuts in FLOPs and optimisation power. We strip safety fine-tuning from Llama 3 8B in one minute and Llama 3 70B in 30 minutes on a single GPU, and sketch ways to reduce this further.

Your Cup of Coffee Is Already Expensive. It’s About to Get Even Worse
extended: Coffee shops around the world, pinching pennies to prevent another round of hikes, are running out of options as bean costs spike.

description: NJ Transit riders' irritation grows with summer of delays, canceled trains
extended: Lawmakers want hearings and an audit. One mayor is even writing 'late notes' for commuters routinely late for work. Some say halt the 15% fare hike.
